commenter_a: I was in an abusive relationship with an alcoholic constantly trying to keep him out of jail, take care of our 2 young children and working as a bartender. I lost a job due to not having a sitter while their father was in jail. Little did I know, 2 people who used to come into my old employment owned a small family bar and needed help. They contacted me and offered me a job. I had only been there for a short time and my boss lent me money to get my boyfriend out of jail. After a month when I reached the end of this relationship my boss lent me his car and more money to get a place and get on my feet. He never took the money I owed him out of my check. He told me to pay when I could. Every year for 3 ...
